backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence requirements (REQ-11, REQ-12, REQ-13) for updating contact details (email, phone, location) in the ContactCTA component.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short descriptions summarizing the purpose and content of each component, hook, and config file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, chart colors, sidebar) using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Espirit de corps React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Navbar, Hero, CompanyProfile, VisionMission, CEOSection, Services, Portfolio, ContactCTA, Footer) in a dark-background layout.
frontend/src/components/CEOSection.tsx: CEO profile section displaying Saravana Kumar's portrait, title, bio, expertise tags, and social links with scroll-triggered fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/CompanyProfile.t: "Who We Are" section with agency description, service highlights checklist, and platform badges for Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, X, and Facebook.
frontend/src/components/ContactCTA.tsx: Contact section featuring a validated contact form with loading/success states and a contact info card displaying email (saravana@espiritdecrops.com), phone (+91 7259145275), and location (Bangalore â€“ All India Remote Available).
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, services list, social media icons, and a copyright notice with smooth-scroll navigation support.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a parallax background image, animated headline, stat counters, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to contact and portfolio sections.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, desktop nav links, a 'Get Started' CTA, and a collapsible mobile menu with smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio section with tabbed display of video reels and poster samples, intersection-observer fade-in animation, and a lightbox for full-size poster viewing.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section displaying four offering cards (Video Reels, Poster Ads, Crisis Management, Landing Pages) with icons, feature lists, and a scroll-to-contact CTA.
frontend/src/components/VisionMission.ts: React component that renders a Vision & Mission section with two styled cards (Vision and Mission), each featuring an icon, descriptive text, and a fade-in scroll animation via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook that attaches an IntersectionObserver to a referenced element and adds a 'visible' CSS class when the element scrolls into view.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark cinematic theme with gold/charcoal OKLCH CSS variables, Tailwind base/component/utility layers, custom fonts (Playfair Display, Inter, Montserrat), and reusable utility classes for animations, gradients, and card hover effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens (gold, charcoal, semantic UI colors), border radii, box shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking the version, summary, architectural notes, and list of implemented features for the 'Espirit de corps' social media agency website.
